details.behavior: While driving a 2018 Toyota Camry, license plate ABC123, defendant G. Torres ran a red light at the intersection of Elm Street and Main Avenue, colliding with a pedestrian, Mr. J. Smith, causing severe injuries to Mr. Smith.
details.evidence: Traffic camera footage, eyewitness testimony from Ms. L. Johnson, medical reports from Bayside General Hospital showcasing Mr. Smith's injuries.

details.behavior: Following the initial collision, G. Torres failed to stop and render aid as required by law, fleeing the scene instead.
details.evidence: Traffic camera footage showing G. Torres leaving the scene, GPS data from G. Torres' vehicle, witness testimony from Mr. K. Wu.

details.behavior: G. Torres attempted to conceal involvement by parking the damaged vehicle in a remote garage and booking a repair appointment without informing police of the accident.
details.evidence: Repair service records from Jet Auto Repair, surveillance footage from garage, statements from repair shop technician, Mr. R. Lee.

judgmentResult.sentencingConsiderations: Severity of the pedestrianâ€™s injuries, failure to stop and render aid, attempt to conceal involvement; no prior criminal record, shown remorse during trial.
